claims.object: Converting rotary motion into linear motion

surface_layer.definition: A design which converts rotary motion into linear motion. It is achieved by connecting a slider and a crank with a rod.

deep_layer.mechanism: Connecting a slider and a crank with a rod.
deep_layer.origin: Mechanical design for converting between rotary and linear motion.
